refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a MIDI connection from Csound to a Jack port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in jacko. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
In the orchestra header, creates a connection from a Jack MIDI output port inside this instance of Csound to an external Jack MIDI input port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ScsoundPortName -- The short name ("portname") of the internal Jack MIDI output port.
SexternalPortName -- The full name ("clientname:portname") of an external Jack MIDI input port.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The actual MIDI data must be written with the JackoMidiOut or JackoNoteOut opcodes.

refentry.note: works with an already running Jack daemon. Do not use -+rtaudio=jack in CsOptions
